title: Light, fast & responsive
text: This WebApp is ready to use, so you don't need to change anything at a component level, You can simply enter the relavent information and see your results

section.title: Why Our Application?
section.content: Our Design is meant to take into account that healthcare in the United States is unaforadable and the vast ocean of data presents a daunting task for the average person to analyze.

section.title: The Solution
section.content: By utilizing this application we are able to provide a preliminary analysis of a condition before it is able to become a major problem. This allows patients to be more proactive in terms of being aware of the present condition of their own health
